Package Chat

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChatDisplay
    Interface defining the callback methods that must be supported for the socket threads to send data back to.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatConnectionHandler
    ChatConnectionHandler is in charge of listening for connections from and initating connections to remote hosts.
    ChatGui
    ChatGui creates the graphical user interface for the SimpleChat program.
    ChatReceiver
    Thread class that deals with receiving data from a remote host and relaying it back to the main chat program.
    ChatSender
    Thread class that deals with sending data from the program to a remote host.
    Checkers
    This panel lets two users play checkers against each other.
    Checkers.Board
    This panel displays a 160-by-160 checkerboard pattern with a 2-pixel black border.
    CheckersData
    An object of this class holds data about a game of checkers.
    CheckersMove
    A CheckersMove object represents a move in the game of Checkers.
    JUtestCheckers
    Tests for the CheckersData, CheckersMove, and Checkers classes
    SocketName
    SocketName encapsulates information about a socket connection so that it can be easily displayed and used as a primary key in a hash map.
